title: Verify: Implement Security Features and Rate Limiting
description:
Run automated tests for task T-029.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Add CORS configuration, rate limiting per user, input sanitization, HTTPS enforcement in production, and sandboxing for Code Node.
Criteria:

- Rate limiting enforced on all endpoints
- Inputs sanitized
- HTTPS enforced in prod
- Code Node sandboxed
acceptance_criteria: Rate limiting enforced on all endpoints
